attributes.action: CALL UPON THE UN TO INTERVENE & PROTECT KASHMIRIS IN INDIAN OCCUPIED KASHMIR
attributes.additional_details: Britain has always since partition of India had a moral obligation for  the Freedom of Kashmiris. Thousands of Kashmiris have been murdered, imprisoned and become victims of Cluster bombs and pellet guns over the last 70 years. We  seek the government to call on the UN  to swiftly intervene in Jammu Kashmir using ALL available legal means, to protect Kashmiris prevent their massacre & oversee a UN mandated plebiscite in the ENTIRE disputed region so that Kashmiris can determine their own future.
attributes.background: Since the abrogation of special status of Kashmir by India by revocation of articles 370 & 35A, kashmir has been in absolute lockdown, having becoming invisible from the inside to the outside world.With  Kashmiris arrested, imprisoned, with a curfew in place.Kashmiris are in fear for their lives.
